eu_initiatives: european pillar of social rights - report on creating labour market conditions favorable for work-life-balance - new start for working parents - digital skills agenda - europese handelsstrategie 'handel voor iedereen' - all the work on chemicals, environment and healthcare - digital single market - work on personal & household services - work on employment (general and specific of women and youth)- regulations on audiovisual media and on digital media - regulations on education (higher education) - lifelong learning -
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Belangen van alle gezinnen in Vlaanderen en Brussel verdedigen. Opvolgen van Europese beslissingen met impact op Vlaamse gezinnen.
